column4: I just got a new computer, and I want to test stability under load.  Any suggestions for programs I can quickly apt-get install that will provide a good test (use up a lot of CPU and RAM)?
i don't know any off by heart but just forkbomb your machine and watch it explode
i would imagine they are, although i have yet to run one, my electricity bills are severe enough already :)
Well this is for my research group at the university, so I don't pay the bill.  :-D
